summary: Ok-hui lives with her grandmother, her mother and the maid. People refer to their house as the "Widow House" because all three adult women who live there are widows. One day, a teacher named Mr. Han moves into the house as a lodger.
cast: Eun-hie Choi|Yeong-gyun Shin|Yeong-seon Jeon|Jin Kyu Kim|Eun-jin Han|Kum-Bong Do
director: Directors: Sang-ok Shin (as Shin Sang-okk), Sang-ok Shin
title: Sarangbang sonnimgwa eomeoni
